hero.heading: Less pressure. More calm.
hero.intro: A simple, natural technique, for professional working mum’s, that dissolves stress at the source and brings you back to yourself.

paragraphs: You don’t need to do more and try harder. What you are seeking is the opposite - room to soften and time for yourself. Space to simply be.

The world has a tendency to pull us outward, constantly asking for more, more doing, more giving, more distractions, more choices and more holding it all together. As a result, your mind doesn’t stop. Your body never fully rests. You want to feel present, but there’s too much going on.
When life keeps asking more of you, you don’t need another responsibility, another doing. You need simplicity and ease. You need more being.

shifts.heading: With Vedic Meditation, something shifts:
items: Meet life with fullness, not depletion.
shifts.outro: You become the version of you that feels real, the one you want to be. The one who smiles more easily, sleeps more deeply, and moves through the day with greater ease.

quote.text: Meditation doesn’t give you a new life. It gives you your life back

items.text: I was exhausted from holding everything together, work, family, life. Learning Vedic Meditation with Kari gave me space to breathe again. I'm present, steady, and I finally feel like myself

I used to carry so much tension, emotionally and physically. I felt full and cluttered. Through meditation with Kari, I’ve cleared so much. I feel spacious, grounded, and excited about the future instead of overwhelmed. I didn’t realise I could feel this calm.
I was rushed and scattered, constantly in my head. Now I look forward to meditation every day, it's becoming a habit I love. I feel calmer, clearer, and inspired to keep going

course.heading: The 4 Day Vedic Meditation Course
course.subheading: Learn the technique in a personalised, in – person teaching experience (individual or small group) with flexible scheduling options.

details.title: Course Duration
details.description: Course is held over 4 consecutive days. Each session is 90 - 120 minutes. Sequential learning to establish a foundation; with each concept building from the previous day

details.title: Practice & Knowledge
details.description: Each day we meditate together, refine the practice and deepen the understanding. Draw knowledge from informal question and answer format.

details.title: Self-Sufficiency
details.description: Leave the course self sufficient in meditation with a technique you can use for life. Receive one to one mentoring to support the practice

details.title: No Dependencies
details.description: No apps. No recordings. No pressure. No ongoing costs required to keep meditating

meetKari.heading: Meet Kari.
points: I study with Thom Knoles the pre-eminent authority of Vedic Knowledge.
I host in-person Vedic meditation courses in the Northern Beaches of Sydney.
I am the founder of Meditate Love Life, and I am committed to the path of a teacher.
I share the Vedic Worldview. I draw understanding from Vedic wisdom, modern science, accomplished masters, and direct experience.
You won’t find me on socials because I am not there.
I have practiced Vedic Meditation for over 15 years and have been teaching for 10.
Like everyone else, I started with 20 minutes of meditation. Now I have accumulated over 219000 minutes. Same technique, 15 years later.

process.heading: Learn to Meditate Love Your Life

steps.title: Release
steps.description: This is where the overwhelm begins to dissolve and the edge begins to soften. Stress leaves the body naturally, the mind settles, and you experience deep rest. Often for the first time in years. Feel spacious again: mentally, emotionally, physically.

steps.title: Restore
steps.description: With the load lifted, a natural steadiness begins to show up. The noise quiets, your energy returns, and you begin responding to life, instead of reacting to it. Feel clearer, more grounded, more present in your own life.

steps.title: Remember
steps.description: Be reminded of what you are — calm, capable, connected. Experience more joy, more ease, more time for what matters. Feel supported, lighter, and genuinely excited about the future.

process.outro: This is a simple, natural, effortless practice. You don’t have to try. The system does the work for you.

support.heading: To maximise your practice you are never left alone to figure it out. Access ongoing support to gain understanding and for your personal evolution.
items: Check-ins to help refine your practice

Free re - sits of the course anytime
support.outro: In 4 days, you will notice a shift. In 60 days, your life will begin to transformation

finalCta.heading: You don’t need to decide anything now. Start with a conversation.
finalCta.text: On this call, we slow down. We look at where you are at, and where you want to be. I share information about the technique. The history, the research, how it works, details of the course and the commitment. You share as much or as little as you like. You ask questions, I give answers. You’ll know — very quickly — if this is the right next step for you. No Pressure. No expectations. No obligation.
finalCta.note: No pressure. No Obligation. No Expectation.
